com.microsoft.band.sensors

Interface BandSensorManager


  • public interface BandSensorManager
    Manager for subscribing and unsubscribing to a Microsoft Band's sensor data through Microsoft Health's band communication service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UserConsent getCurrentHeartRateConsent()
      Method to check if the user of the calling application has granted consent to access their heart rate data
      boolean registerAccelerometerEventListener(BandAccelerometerEventListener bandAccelerationEventListener, SampleRate reportingInterval)
      Method to register a listener for BandAccelerometerEvents
      boolean registerAltimeterEventListener(BandAltimeterEventListener bandAltimeterEventListener)
      Method to register a listener for BandAltimeterEvents (Will only work with V2 bands)

      Method to register a listener for BandAmbientLightEvents (Will only work with V2 bands)

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentHeartRateConsent

        UserConsent getCurrentHeartRateConsent()
        Method to check if the user of the calling application has granted consent to access their heart rate data
        Returns:
        UserConsent.GRANTED if the user has granted consent, UserConsent.DECLINED if the user has declined consent, and UserConsent.UNSPECIFIED if you have not yet asked for user consent

      • registerAccelerometerEventListener

        boolean registerAccelerometerEventListener(BandAccelerometerEventListener bandAccelerationEventListener,
                                         SampleRate reportingInterval)
                                           throws BandIOException
        Method to register a listener for BandAccelerometerEvents
        Parameters:
        bandAccelerationEventListener - a listener for BandAccelerometerEvents
        reportingInterval - the sample rate interval for BandAccelerometerEvents
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem

      • registerAltimeterEventListener

        boolean registerAltimeterEventListener(BandAltimeterEventListener bandAltimeterEventListener)
                                       throws BandIOException,
                                              InvalidBandVersionException
        Method to register a listener for BandAltimeterEvents (Will only work with V2 bands)
        Parameters:
        bandAltimeterEventListener - a listener for BandAltimeterEvents
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem
        InvalidBandVersionException - thrown if attempted when trying to connect to a Microsoft Band 1

      • registerAmbientLightEventListener

        boolean registerAmbientLightEventListener(BandAmbientLightEventListener bandAmbientLightEventListener)
                                          throws BandIOException,
                                                 InvalidBandVersionException
        Method to register a listener for BandAmbientLightEvents (Will only work with V2 bands)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem
        InvalidBandVersionException - thrown if attempted when trying to connect to a Microsoft Band 1

      • registerGsrEventListener

        boolean registerGsrEventListener(BandGsrEventListener bandGsrEventListener,
                               GsrSampleRate sampleRate)
                                 throws BandIOException,
                                        InvalidBandVersionException
        Method to register a listener for BandGsrEvents (Will only work with V2 bands)
        Parameters:
        bandGsrEventListener - a listener for BandGsrEvents
        sampleRate - the sample rate interval for BandGyroscopeEvents
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem
        InvalidBandVersionException - thrown if attempted when trying to connect to a Microsoft Band 1

      • registerGyroscopeEventListener

        boolean registerGyroscopeEventListener(BandGyroscopeEventListener bandGyroscopeEventListener,
                                     SampleRate reportingInterval)
                                       throws BandIOException
        Method to register a listener for BandGyroscopeEvents
        Parameters:
        bandGyroscopeEventListener - a listener for BandGyroscopeEvents

      • registerHeartRateEventListener

        boolean registerHeartRateEventListener(BandHeartRateEventListener bandHeartRateEventListener)
                                       throws BandIOException,
                                              BandException
        Method to register a listener for BandHeartRateEvents [Requires user to explicitly grant permission first via requestHeartRateConsent(Activity, HeartRateConsentListener)]
        Parameters:
        bandHeartRateEventListener - a listener for BandHeartRateEvents
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem
        BandException - thrown if the user of the application has not given access to their heart rate data
        See Also:
        getCurrentHeartRateConsent(), requestHeartRateConsent(Activity, HeartRateConsentListener)

      • registerPedometerEventListener

        boolean registerPedometerEventListener(BandPedometerEventListener bandPedometerEventListener)
                                       throws BandIOException
        Method to register a listener for BandPedometerEvents
        Parameters:
        bandPedometerEventListener - a listener for BandPedometerEvents
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem

      • registerRRIntervalEventListener

        boolean registerRRIntervalEventListener(BandRRIntervalEventListener bandRRIntervalEventListener)
                                        throws BandIOException,
                                               BandException,
                                               InvalidBandVersionException
        Method to register a listener for BandRRIntervalEvents [Requires user to explicitly grant permission first via requestHeartRateConsent(Activity, HeartRateConsentListener)] (Also, this method will only work with V2 bands)
        Parameters:
        bandRRIntervalEventListener - a listener for BandRRIntervalEvents
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the band is currently connected, and thus whether new events can be expected immediately
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem
        BandException - thrown if the user of the application has not given access to their heart rate data
        InvalidBandVersionException - thrown if attempted when trying to connect to a Microsoft Band 1
        See Also:
        getCurrentHeartRateConsent(), requestHeartRateConsent(Activity, HeartRateConsentListener)

      • requestHeartRateConsent

        void requestHeartRateConsent(android.app.Activity activity,
                           HeartRateConsentListener consentListener)
        Method to show an AlertDialog allowing the user to explicitly grant access to their heart rate data. The AlertDialog inherits its style from the application, and thus its appearance can be modified.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity used to show the dialog
        consentListener - a listener for reacting to a user granting or declining consent

      • unregisterAccelerometerEventListener

        void unregisterAccelerometerEventListener(BandAccelerometerEventListener bandAccelerationEventListener)
                                          throws BandIOException
        Method to unregister a listener for BandAccelerometerEvents
        Parameters:
        bandAccelerationEventListener - the listener to unregister
        Throws:
        BandIOException - thrown if there is a connection problem

        Throws:
